_source.text: According to Egoscue, reversing the effects of poor musculoskeletal fitness provides astonishing benefits, including: -Better balance, posture, and breathing, as well as increased resiliency -Effective and safe weight management -Healthy bone density and visual acuity -Heightened sex drive -Delayed symptoms of aging -Peace of mind and general tranquility Extensively illustrated to demonstrate proper placement, posture, and movement, Pain Free for Women offers women of every age the possibility of feeling better than ever before.
